resources.string: Founded in 1891, the Chicago Symphony Orchestra is consistently hailed as one of the greatest orchestras in the world.
Chicago Jazz, Blues and Beyond Bus Tour
See architectural landmarks of Chicago blues and jazz history in neighborhoods north to south while a highly trained, passionate tour guide shares forgotten stories of Chicago blues and jazz.
The record store that was in the movie, High Fidelity, featuring John Cusack.

Broadway In Chicago presents a full range of entertainment, including musicals and plays, on the stages of five of the finest theatres in Chicago’s Loop including the CIBC Theatre, Oriental Theatre, Cadillac Palace Theatre, the Auditorium Theatre of Roosevelt University and just off the Magnificent Mile, the Broadway Playhouse at Water Tower Place. Broadway In Chicago is best known for attracting pre-Broadway productions, highlights of those include THE PRODUCERS, SPAMALOT, MOVIN’ OUT, THE ADDAMS FAMILY, KINKY BOOTS and ON YOUR FEET, as well as long-run engagements including WICKED, Disney’s THE LION KING, THE BOOK OF MORMON, and HAMILTON to name a few

Founded in 1907, the jazz clube has early associations with prohibition and Al Capone. Today, the Green Mill entertains audiences with a mix of jazz artists who perform music from 30s, 40s, etc. to the present.
